channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bill Gates says he's ready to plow billions into a next-gen nuclear plant being built by his startup
item.description: “I put in over a billion, and I’ll put in billions more,” said Gates.

item.title: China May retail sales beat expectations, but industrial output and fixed asset investment missed
item.description: However, other economic metrics, such as industrial output and fixed asset investment, missed Reuters forecasts.

item.title: Activist investor Starboard reportedly seeking changes at Autodesk
Top Wall Street bear surrenders to bull market and flips forecast, now seeing the S&P 500 soaring to 6,000 by year-end
item.description: "Today, GenAI’s potential in every job and sector is inflecting. The backdrop of slowing inflation, a Fed intent on cutting rates and growth support Goldilocks.”

item.title: Activist Starboard amasses Autodesk stake, weighs suit over delayed probe disclosure
item.description: Autodesk has been under deep scrutiny over an accounting scandal that led to the resignation of its CFO over potentially inflated financial metrics.

item.title: Big Tech — not the Fed — drives this stock rally. What investors need to know.
Electricity prices in France turn negative as renewable energy floods the grid
item.description: French day-ahead power fell to -€5.76 a megawatt-hour, the lowest in four years, in an auction on Epex Spot.

item.title: Singapore’s 'shophouses' are catching the eye of the rich, with some forking out tens of millions
item.description: Shophouses are colonial-era buildings — with some built as early as the 1840s — that are under a government conservation program.

item.title: Kaskhari says it’s ‘reasonable’ to predict Fed won’t cut rates until December
$155 million debut for 'Inside Out 2' is biggest since 'Barbie' and second best ever for Disney's Pixar
item.description: The success is significant for Pixar, marking a much-needed return to form for a studio that has had a string of underwhelming launches.

item.title: Malaysia is emerging as a data center powerhouse amid booming demand from AI
item.description: According to DC Byte's 2024 Global Data Centre Index, the city of Johor Bahru is the fastest growing data center market in Southeast Asia.

item.title: Advent International to take up to $3B minority stake in Fisher Investments
Gen X is the least confident about retirement as 'crunch time' nears—and has done less to prepare than boomers or millennials
item.description: "Gen Xers are reaching crunch time for retirement planning. For Gen Xers, retirement is no longer this far off idea."

item.title: Forget Nvidia: Wealth manager for the ultra-rich names 3 global stocks to buy instead
item.description: Dhruba Jyoti Sengupta of Wrise Private Middle East is looking beyond investor darling Nvidia, naming three global stocks he prefers right now.

item.title: On Father’s Day, here’s the worst thing you can do — and it’s not gifting a tie
